h-body: Fixtures are a great way to mock data for responses to routes
h-hero-text: A fully featured Personalized Booking Assistant
book-auth-error-body: You need to log in to be able to proceed forward with the booking. Click on the Sign in / Register button at the top right corner of the screen
success-auth-notification-title: Welcome back to the My Seatings platform, james@bond.com !
success-auth-notification-body: You can start navigating around our platform for watch for performance and ticket booking
logout-notification-body: Hope we will get to see you soon. Loggged out successfully !
